articles.title: Rupee to fall on dollar recovery on signs US job market remains robust - Reuters.com
articles.description: The Indian rupee is expected to decline on Friday after the number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, lifting the U.S. dollar and U.S. yields.

articles.title: This is how Phoenix is surviving its worst-ever heat wave - The Arizona Republic
articles.description: America's hottest big city is in the middle of the worst-ever heat wave, but people continue to work and play, with a few extra precautions.
